title: "Maryland Student Creates 'Seeing' App for the Blind"
excerpt: "Derrick Day, a 17-year-old at Westminster High School who is blind, created an app called LDOT (long-distance object tracker) that uses artificial intelligence to verbally identify objects that appear in a phone's camera."
